name: Laughing in the Face of Death
name_original: Laughing in the Face of Death
description:
In a world under lockdown, how is a young comedian suppossed to get a break?

Because that's the biggest problem right now.

Join David R. Mincer, a comedian that no one has heard of, in the weird virtual world of his mind as he tries to put on a good show. All while fighting with his own existential struggles, expressing opinions no one wants to hear and trying to keep it censored for his parents.

David also writes his game descriptions in the third person.
